com.scalar.dl.ledger.model

Class ContractRegistrationRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scalar.dl.ledger.model.AbstractRequest
      • com.scalar.dl.ledger.model.ContractRegistrationRequest

  • @Immutable
public class ContractRegistrationRequest
extends AbstractRequest
    A request for contract registration.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ContractRegistrationRequest(java.lang.String contractId, java.lang.String contractBinaryName, byte[] contractByteCode, java.lang.String contractProperties, java.lang.String certHolderId, int certVersion, byte[] signature)
      Constructs a ContractRegistrationRequest with the specified contract id, contract binary name, contract itself in byte-code format, certificate holder ID, certificate version and signature of the request.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ContractRegistrationRequest

        public ContractRegistrationRequest(java.lang.String contractId,
                                   java.lang.String contractBinaryName,
                                   byte[] contractByteCode,
                                   @Nullable
                                   java.lang.String contractProperties,
                                   java.lang.String certHolderId,
                                   int certVersion,
                                   byte[] signature)
        Constructs a ContractRegistrationRequest with the specified contract id, contract binary name, contract itself in byte-code format, certificate holder ID, certificate version and signature of the request.
        Parameters:
        contractId - an id of a registered contract to execute
        contractBinaryName - a binary name of a registered contract to execute
        contractByteCode - a contract itself in byte-code format
        contractProperties - properties in json format
        certHolderId - a certificate holder id
        certVersion - a certificate version
        signature - a signature of the request

      • equals

        public boolean equals(java.lang.Object o)
        Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this object. The other object is considered equal if it is the same instance or if:
        • both super class instances are equal and
        • it is also an ContractRegistrationRequest and
        • both instances have the same contract id, contract name, contract and signature.
        Overrides:
        equals in class AbstractRequest
        Parameters:
        o - an object to be tested for equality
        Returns:
        true if the other object is "equal to" this object otherwise false
